I fell in love with the characters and could not stop reading' - Amazon Reviewer'This was a beautifully written modern Greek Tragedy, I absolutely love love love loved this!' - Goodreads ReviewerFinding your soulmate should be easy. At least, when the Goddess Aphrodite is involved — but Vanessa Reyes’ life seems more Greek Tragedy than Happily Ever AfterWhen a supposed clerical error turns the moment Vanessa has spent all her life waiting for into a nightmare instead of a dream come true, she finds herself in an unprecedented situation.With two soulmates instead of one; Alexander, Vanessa and Theo are forced to question everything they ever wanted and where they truly belong. After all, can you really be whole with only half of your soul?Join the thousands of readers who adored The Promise of Lightning
